title: Paid more zakat than what was due - can this amount be deducted from next years zakat?
transcript: brother I met from the Emirates asked about giving the cat more than what is actually do so for example I have 40,000 euros my zakat is one thousand but I miscalculated it and I paid two thousand so after giving it to the poor a month or two later and I made my calculations again I said Wow I paid one thousand extra hmm no problem the thousand extra I will make it deductible from next year zakah is this valid the answer is no it was given out and the 1000 euro is a cat the extra one thousand will be charity for you you cannot count it from next year's zakat
